findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of PEAK tokens
findings.description: As part of governance mechanism, contract operator can mint PEAK to pay debt.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The OwnableUpgradeable contract allows an operator to upgrade the implementation of the contract without restriction, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: Peak Finance Dao's smart contracts have active ownership which creates a risk of rug pull scams and centralization related risks are higher than common smart contract vulnerabilities.
